Uses of Interface
org.eclipse.jface.databinding.swt.IWidgetValueProperty

Packages that use IWidgetValueProperty
Package
Description
org.eclipse.jface.databinding.swt
Provides classes that can be used to observe changes in SWT widgets.
org.eclipse.jface.databinding.swt.typed
 

  • Uses of IWidgetValueProperty in org.eclipse.jface.databinding.swt

    Classes in org.eclipse.jface.databinding.swt that implement IWidgetValueProperty
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    class 
    WidgetValueProperty<S extends Widget,T>
    Abstract value property implementation for Widget properties.

  • Uses of IWidgetValueProperty in org.eclipse.jface.databinding.swt.typed

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    static <S extends Control>
    IWidgetValueProperty<S,Color>
    WidgetProperties.background()
    Returns a value property for observing the background color of a Control.

    IWidgetValueProperty<S,Rectangle>
    WidgetProperties.bounds()
    Returns a value property for observing the bounds of a Control.

    Returns a value property for observing the selection state of a Button.

    Returns a value property for observing the selection state of a Combo.

    WidgetProperties.dateTimeSelection()
    Returns a value property for observing the selection state of a DateTime.
    static <S extends Control>
    IWidgetValueProperty<S,Boolean>
    WidgetProperties.editable()
    Returns a value property for observing the editable state of a CCombo (since 1.6), StyledText (since 1.6), or Text.
    static <S extends Widget>
    IWidgetValueProperty<S,Boolean>
    WidgetProperties.enabled()
    Returns a value property for observing the enablement state of a Control, Menu (since 1.5), MenuItem (since 1.5), ScrollBar (since 1.5) or ToolItem (since 1.5).
    static <S extends Control>
    IWidgetValueProperty<S,Boolean>
    WidgetProperties.focused()
    Returns a value property for observing the focus state of a Control.

    WidgetProperties.font()
    Returns a value property for observing the font of a Control.
    static <S extends Control>
    IWidgetValueProperty<S,Color>
    WidgetProperties.foreground()
    Returns a value property for observing the foreground color of a Control.
    static <S extends Widget>
    IWidgetValueProperty<S,Image>
    WidgetProperties.image()
    Returns a value property for observing the image of a Button, CLabel, Item or Label.
    static IWidgetValueProperty<List,String>
    WidgetProperties.listSelection()
    Returns a value property for observing the selection state of a List.
    static IWidgetValueProperty<DateTime,LocalDate>
    WidgetProperties.localDateSelection()
    Returns a value property for observing the selection state of a DateTime with the SWT.DATE or SWT.CALENDAR style.
    static IWidgetValueProperty<DateTime,LocalTime>
    WidgetProperties.localTimeSelection()
    Returns a value property for observing the selection state of a DateTime with the SWT.TIME style.
    static <S extends Control>
    IWidgetValueProperty<S,Point>
    WidgetProperties.location()
    Returns a value property for observing the location of a Control.
    static <S extends Control>
    IWidgetValueProperty<S,Integer>
    WidgetProperties.maximum()
    Returns a value property for observing the maximum value of a Scale, Slider (since 1.5) or Spinner.

    WidgetProperties.menuItemSelection()
    Returns a value property for observing the selection state of a MenuItem.

    IWidgetValueProperty<S,String>
    WidgetProperties.message()
    Returns a value property for observing the message of a Text or ToolTip.

    IWidgetValueProperty<S,Integer>
    WidgetProperties.minimum()
    Returns a value property for observing the minimum value of a Scale, Slider (since 1.5) or Spinner.

    WidgetProperties.scaleSelection()
    Returns a value property for observing the selection state of a Scale.

    Returns a value property for observing the single selection index of a CCombo, Combo, List or Table.

    IWidgetValueProperty<S,String>

    Returns a value property for observing the text of a Button, CCombo, CLabel, Combo, Item, Label, Link, Shell, Group, StyledText or Text.

    IWidgetValueProperty<S,String>

    Returns a value property for observing the text of a StyledText or Text.
    static <S extends Widget>

    Returns a value property for observing the text of a StyledText or Text.
    static <S extends Widget>
    IWidgetValueProperty<S,String>
    WidgetProperties.tooltipText()
    Returns a value property for observing the tooltip text of a CTabItem, Control, TabItem, TableColumn, ToolItem, TrayItem or TreeColumn.
    static <S extends Widget>
    IWidgetValueProperty<S,Boolean>
    WidgetProperties.visible()
    Returns a value property for observing the visibility state of a Control, Menu, ScrollBar, ToolBar or ToolTip.
    static <S extends Widget, T>
    IWidgetValueProperty<S,T>
    WidgetProperties.widgetSelection()
    Returns a value property for observing the selection state of a Button, CCombo, Combo, DateTime, List, MenuItem (since 1.5), Scale, Slider (since 1.5) or Spinner.
